response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is an investment worth $1,000,000 to us due to its unique features and the extensive research and development it has undergone. Given its immense value, we are extending this opportunity to you with the understanding that it aligns perfectly with your business objectives.

We are offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you benefit from the latest advancements in our industry while also providing you with substantial savings compared to the market value.

Please consider this proposal carefully. We are confident that our product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you for considering our offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the growth of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
